Font characteristics.style: Serif, all caps for 'MADE EASY', larger font size, black color

Text placement.placement: top center, over a pink/salmon background

Text placement.text: Brady- = Slow, Erythro- = Red, Mono- = One, Supra- = Above
Text placement.placement: left side, in a vertical list, with corresponding graphical icons to their right

Colorful, playful icons to attract and reduce anxiety around complex medical topics
Brand elements present: EZ MED logo badge in the upper left, signifying the brand/channel

Icons and color cues visually explain the word meanings, echoing the 'MADE EASY' promise in the title
Medical prefixes are clearly shown, reinforcing the content focus
Contrasts or mismatches: None significant; the thumbnail is closely matched to the title's promise. It clearly conveys clarity, ease, and medical terminology/prefix focus.
